title: Jonathan Cheban Has A History Of Body Shaming On Instagram! Look! | PerezHilton.com
text:
When we saw Jonathan Cheban body-shaming a woman in response to her slamming his fur habits , we were disgusted. 
But it turns out it's kind of his go-to move. 
Related: Prosecutors Will NOT Be Going Easy On Playboy 's Dani Mathers 
After the fur flew between Jonathan and an animal activist, we came across another person whom Kim Kardashian West 's BFF bullied on Instagram ! 
When Paul Dupuis said something he didn't like on one of his photos, Cheban went all out NSFW on Paul's looks, finding his pics and commenting: 
Yeah, if you can't read that, it says: 
"U pathetic jay Leno chin cock sucker. Your worrying about me??? ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ bro check my life out cunt. What do u do?? Tell me about your pathetic life. First of all cunt face I have a girlfriends for years. So no HOLE for you. Second Kim and I are friends for 10 yrs moron. Show me your poor pathetic lowlife BFF" 
And thenâ€¦ 
That says: 
"Don't worry about me cunt. I live like a king u little eyebrow arch freak. U wish u had one day in my life. Even one hour. Don't call me poot anything little bitch" 
He really does sound like a rich kid bully from an '80s high school movie. What a jerk! 
Leave the physical features out of it next time, Cheban!
